name: Magical Match-3
description:
Notes: Please play in fullscreen mode. It is not likely to work otherwise. I'm lucky it works at all

Just a terrible match 3 game where you slay monsters by matching magical runes. 

You can match either 3-in-a-row or a 2x2 square of identical tiles, or any combination of those. Each tile matched deals 1 damage to the monster. After the monster dies, a new one will take its place. When you beat the dragon, you win!

I ran out of time budget for art after making the match-3 system work, so forgive the horrible 5-minute artwork and utter lack of animations and effects. Actually, just forgive the whole thing. We'll pretend it never happened.
